If the American traditional and popular blueberry pie, the diverse tastes of Russia. We love pies with filling, and without, chebureks, pancakes and ... In short, the Russian voracious eating. The same can be said about sex. Sexual omnivorous Russian youth is striking. What to choose: the sex, or feast your stomach? Each of the heroes of our film solves this problem in its own way.
